title: What was the device that Tesla created that would make energy free? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Mystical Nikola Tesla was building a tower to transmit free energy to all the people of the world. The Real Nikola Tesla wouldn’t have given you the time of day for free. He was seriously into getting rich - he’d made and lost three fortunes and was trying for his fourth when he ran out of money and had to resort to skipping out on his hotel bills. The Wardenclyffe site (where his tower was) would have had several factories where thousands of people would have been employed making his inventions, including receivers for the power coming from the Wardenclyffe site.

Tesla began to build his Wardenclyffe laboratory on Long Island, New York in 1901 to promote his ideas of wireless power transmission. It was never finished because he ran out of money. Different variations of this A2A question about the wireless power or "free energy" process of Tesla are asked on a regular basis here on Quora.
